<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script will modify the internal type of field 'rich_text' from 'html' to 'html_script' for 'sn_hr_core_link' table when HR application is upgraded to K release.</description>
        <name>Change html field type for Hr Links</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var hrLinks = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_link');
var dbu = new GlideDBUpdate('sys_dictionary');
var dbq = new GlideDBQuery('sys_dictionary');
dbq.addQuery('name', 'sn_hr_core_link');
dbq.addQuery('element', 'rich_text');
dbq.addQuery('internal_type', 'html');
dbu.setQuery(dbq);
dbu.setValue('internal_type', 'html_script');
if (hrLinks.isValidField('table')) {
	dbu.setValue('dependent', 'table');
	dbu.setValue('dependent_on_field', 'table');
	dbu.setValue('use_dependent_field', 'true');
}
dbu.execute();
dbu.close();
dbq.close();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>

</record_update>
